title: Remove platform branding from footer and show only copyright notice

requirements.text: Update the site footer to remove all platform branding and display only the exact text: "© 2026 SankalpHub Solutions. All rights reserved." Remove the existing "Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai" text and the caffeine.ai link, and keep the footer otherwise clean (no additional footer content besides that single copyright line).

quotes:
Remove the footer text:
"Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai"

Do not show any platform branding in the footer.
Keep the footer clean with only:
© 2026 SankalpHub Solutions. All rights reserved.

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/App.tsx Layout footer, the rendered footer contains no references to "caffeine", "caffeine.ai", "Built with", or any outbound link to caffeine.ai.
The footer renders exactly: "© 2026 SankalpHub Solutions. All rights reserved." (including the year 2026, and the company name "SankalpHub Solutions").
No other footer elements (e.g., footer navigation links) are rendered; the footer is a single clean line of text.
The change applies consistently across all routes/pages since the footer is part of the shared Layout.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change header/navigation, routing, SEO metadata, sitemap, or robots.txt.
Do not introduce new branding, badges, or promotional links elsewhere on the site.
